message.content:
1. The surgery time was longer in the MIS group.
2. The difference in surgery time between the MIS group and the conventional group was statistically significant (p < 0.001).
3. There was higher blood loss in the MIS group compared to the conventional group.
4. The difference in blood loss between the MIS group and the conventional group was statistically significant (p = 0.002).

messages.content:
Statement: Surgery time was significantly longer (p < 0.001) and there were significantly higher blood loss (p = 0.002) in the MIS group as compared to the conventional group.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
